comments.body: Note that the one on NPM at least seems to be available as a module instead of as a global. So it should have `export = FuzzySet;` and be imported with `import FuzzySet = require("fuzzyset");` if so.

Yes you are right, that's the syntax I use in my project, I recently added the module way so I join it to this PR (and add import in tests as well).
Still, the global way is also possible, both are coexistent in this library.
